title: Crayola Quick Dry Paint Sticks, Assorted Colors, Washable Paint Set for Kids, 12 Count
features: CRAYOLA KIDS PAINTS: This less mess kids paint set includes 12 Paint Sticks in assorted colors.
QUICK DRY PAINT: These convenient Crayola paints require no added water and dry in 60 seconds or less on most poster board.
PAINT SUPPLIES: They are full coverage paints designed to work on a variety of surfaces and require no water, setup, or clean up.
WASHABLE PAINTS: Wash from skin and most washable clothing.
SAFE AND NONTOXIC: Ideal paint set for kids, ages 3 & up.
description: Enjoy the fun of painting with less mess! This set features 12 Crayola Paint Sticks in assorted colors. Each washable paint color easily washes from skin and washable fabric, making it great for young artists and their parents. Designed to work on a variety of surfaces, these convenient paint sticks provide full coverage and can be easily re-capped and stored for future use. Unlike traditional paints, Crayola Paint Sticks do not require water and dry in 60 seconds or less when used on poster board. Safe and nontoxic, these paints are ideal for adults and children, ages 3 and up.
